wiki.content:
"Say My Name" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 Chart and U.S. Billboard Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks Chart in the Winter of 2000.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Say My Name" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 Chart and U.S. Billboard Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks Chart in the Winter of 2000.

track.name: Say My Name
comments: agred, epic like warhammer epic it'self!
U actin' kinda shady, aint calling me baby! >:-(

♫Say my name, say my name,
If no one is around you,
Say baby I love you,
If you ain't runnin' game♫ ♥
♥♫ ♥ ♫SSSSSAAAAAYYYYY MMMMMYYYYYY NNNNAAAAMMMMEEEE♥♫ ♥ ♫ LIKE FLORENCE WOULD SAY!!!!♥♫ ♥ ♫
I Love Destiny Child... I love this song...
Some wicked ladies,some wicked vocals on a wicked track!!!
